main event: A very large, round, glowing object was observed descending to about 1500 feet, then darted up and appeared to explode, casting off fragments of sparks. The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute and was silent.
interesting points: The object's altitude and velocity were very rapid and it emitted no sound., The object was described as bright white in color., The witness is deemed not completely reliable, affecting the evaluation of the sighting., Conclusions suggest it might have been a natural phenomenon like a meteor or bolide., The case remains unresolved as there was no photographic evidence or physical proof.
sighted object: a very large, round, glowing object
witness description: The witness is considered not completely reliable according to the conclusions of the report.
